name: guardian-naga-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of guardian-naga-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of guardian-naga-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a detailed concept art of a heroic fantasy scenario, akin to the style of tabletop games, particularly Dungeons and Dragons 5e. The scene should be set in a blend of underwater and sky realm where a muscular guardian-naga creature with unique limbs is seen in motion. The creature is highlighted using an exceptional three-color palette of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens with pearl accents that render an aquatic fantasy realism feel. The picture should include a human silhouette for comparison, adorned with culturally coherent medieval gear, while excluding modern tech or signage. The texture should resemble pressure-dome materials, emphasizing aquascape-like features such as subsurface caustics and bioluminescent aspects. Maintain a consistent, painterly collection style, avoiding modern sci-fi UIs, glaring bloom effects, photoreal CGI, anime style, or embedded text. The image should be of specific aspect/resolution and free from visual artifacts.
